title: BRIEF-DBA Group Says Board Approves Consolidated Results As On 30 June
text:
BRIEF-DBA Group Says Board Approves Consolidated Results As On 30 June

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 28, 2019 06:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-DBA Group Says Board Approves Consolidated Results As On 30 June Sept 27 (Reuters) - Dba Group Spa : * DBA GROUP SAYS BOARD APPROVES CONSOLIDATED RESULTS AS ON 30 JUNE APPROVES 2019 FORECAST AND CONFIRMS CLOSING OF UNISTAR DEAL SCHEDULED ON 30 SEPT * IN FIRST HALF OF 2019, VALUE OF PRODUCTION WAS EQUAL TO EURO 26.3 MILLION * EBITDA IN FIRST HALF OF 2019 IS NEGATIVE AND EQUAL TO EURO -0.22 MILLION * H1 NET FINANCIAL POSITION EUR 10.7 MILLION

BRIEF-DBA Group Says Board Approves Consolidated Results As On 30 June
description: BRIEF-DBA Group Says Board Approves Consolidated Results As On 30 June
